reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Doe explains concepts well and is always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is passionate about literature and makes the classes engaging.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson knows his subject well, but his lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is very knowledgeable and always encourages questions.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Williams is excellent at breaking down complex programming concepts.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is tough on grading and doesn't provide much feedback.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's classes are challenging, but you learn a lot if you keep up.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Moore creates a great classroom environment and encourages discussion.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is an expert in his field and makes complex topics accessible.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez challenges students to think critically about various topics.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Thomas provides clear explanations, but the material can be overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Jackson makes physics fun and provides great examples during lectures.

reviews.subject: Education
reviews.review: Dr. White is supportive and encourages future educators to think outside the box.

reviews.subject: Art
reviews.review: Dr. Harris brings creativity and passion to every class. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Prof. Clark knows her subject well, but the coursework is very demanding.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis makes the subject fascinating with real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Nursing
reviews.review: Prof. Walker is a great mentor for nursing students and provides practical advice.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Dr. Hall brings his real-world business experience into the classroom.

reviews.subject: Criminal Justice
reviews.review: Prof. Young is knowledgeable and provides great case studies for discussion.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. King is passionate about the environment, but his tests are quite difficult.
